information.description: By using Peacock, you agree to our Privacy Policy. Please read and review the policy if you have not done so already. A copy can be found at https://thepeacockproject.org/wiki/legal/privacy-policy.

In addition, only connect to Peacock servers you trust. Sensitive game and game store platform (e.g. Steam/Epic Games) data will be sent to and processed by the server, and The Peacock Project has no control over how they may use it.
